name: PROC_DUP_CHECK_GRP
description: This table stores all single-response information for a Procedure Duplicate Check Group (LDG).

columns.name: GROUP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the group record.

columns.name: GROUP_ID_GROUP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Procedure Duplicate Check Group record.

columns.name: GROUP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Procedure Duplicate Check Group record.
